title: Can I buy a displayed piece (laptop)? - Quora

response.answer_text: No you shouldn’t. I have a lot of experience in this and I want to share it. Buying a display laptop could have a weak battery and may be faulty. The reason to this is that those laptops are always ON and are not TURNED OFF after the shop is closed. This may lead to a weak battery. On the other hand there are many people who use it to see how it works and some people may have treated it BADLY. Please
